entry.title: $2300 // Cute Apt, Great Grand Army Plaza Location
entry.content:
OPEN HOUSE: Weekend of Aug 25th if it's not taken before
Email me to schedule another day and time to see it and with any questions you may have. Unless you're a broker in which case, do NOT email me. NO brokers please. No I don't need or want your help. How else can I ask brokers not to contact me?

Unit & Building: This is a ~480 sq ft. 1BR for rent on the ground floor (not street-side) of a 48 unit condo split into two buildings with a community courtyard. Laundry (with smart card machines), good size locked private storage and locked bike storage in the basement (all included). Onsite super who is awesome and happily helps with almost anything you might need.

Neighborhood: Located on a quiet block in the best part of Prospect Heights. Three blocks from four express trains: the 2,3 at Grand Army Plaza; and the B,Q at 7th Ave. ~15 mins to Wall St and ~30 mins to midtown. Three blocks to Prospect Park (the Saturday Farmers' Market), the library, Park Slope and a 5 minute walk to Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum.

Apartment:

  • Open kitchen with granite counters and GE stainless steel appliances (gas stove with power-boil BTU setting, 1/2 size dishwasher, full refrigerator)
  • Living room has an exposed brick fireplace (non-working)
  • Bedroom closet has been redone to maximize storage and organization (Container Store Alpha style)
  • Marble floor bathroom (with the curved shower curtain rod you've always wanted)
  • Hardwood floors, cable ready, no view, not tons of light
  • am I too honest?
Other:
  • Heat and water included in the rent - you pay for gas and electric
  • Pets ok - smokers NOT
  • Available Sept 15th (maybe 1-2 weeks before)
  • Lease term 1 yr minimum
  • Sign the lease, give me first month's rent + 1 month security deposit and it'll be yours
Email me to setup an appointment, best chance of scheduling will be weekdays 8-9a or 6-9p.
